content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences or emotions, but I understand what you mean. Indeed, the Pokémon franchise has shown great versatility in its ability to stay relevant and exciting for its fanbase. Over the years, the franchise has introduced new generations of Pokémon, new regions to explore, new characters to follow, and new gameplay mechanics to keep things fresh. This versatility has allowed the franchise to cater to different generations of fans, from those who grew up with the first game and anime series to younger generations who are discovering the franchise for the first time.
